body_html:
Chainer folks claim that they are 5.5 times faster than TF in the distributed environment (128 GPUs, Resnet-50):
http://chainer.org/general/2017/02/08/Performance-of-Distributed-Deep-Learning-Using-ChainerMN.html

I think it is mostly because of RDMA/InfiniBand (MXNet and CNTK are doing much better, most likely because of it).

body:
Chainer folks claim that they are 5.5 times faster than TF in the distributed environment (128 GPUs, Resnet-50):
http://chainer.org/general/2017/02/08/Performance-of-Distributed-Deep-Learning-Using-ChainerMN.html

I think it is mostly because of RDMA/InfiniBand (MXNet and CNTK are doing much better, most likely because of it).
